org.anyframe.xplatform.web
Class XPRequestHandlerUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.anyframe.xplatform.web.XPRequestHandlerUtil

public class XPRequestHandlerUtil
extends Object

The util class needed at UI development using the Tobesoft's XPLATFORM. XPRequestHandlerUtil class provides functions to convert HttpServletRequest & HttpServletResponse to PlatformRequest & PlatformResponse. And it provides functions to convert DataSet or VariableList to Map or VO Object.

Author:
Youngmin Jo, modified by Jongpil Park

getDataSetAsMap

public List<Map<String,Object>> getDataSetAsMap(String dataSetName)
Get DataSet as List of Map contains information about a row type. Key of the Map object for the row Type is "rowType".

Parameters:
dataSetName - Name of DataSet to get
Returns:
List of Map Object.

Parameters:
dataSetName - Name of DataSet to get
convertToCamelCase - true for convert columns to camelCase.
Returns:
List of Map Object.

getDataSetAsListMap

public Map<String,List<Map<String,Object>>> getDataSetAsListMap(String dataSetName)
Get DataSet as Map contains three List Objects. Key of the Map object for the inserted rows is "insert". Key of the Map object for the updated rows is "update". Key of the Map object for the deleted rows is "delete".

Parameters:
dataSetName - Name of DataSet to get
Returns:
Map contains three List object.

getDataSetAsListMap

Get DataSet as Map contains three List> Objects. Key of the Map object for the inserted rows is "insert". Key of the Map object for the updated rows is "update". Key of the Map object for the deleted rows is "delete".

Parameters:
dataSetName - Name of DataSet to get
convertToCamelCase - true for convert columns to camelCase.

Map contains three List object.
